fields.name: standfirst
fields.label: Standfirst
fields.text_allowed_html_tags: strong em a ul ol li b i

fields.name: article_author
fields.label: Author
fields.description: The author(s) of the article, if different from the page creator.

fields.name: featured_profiles
fields.label: Featured Profiles
fields.description: Profiles featured in this article.

fields.name: featured_works
fields.label: Featured Works
fields.description: Works featured in this article.

fields.name: featured_collections
fields.label: Featured Collections
fields.description: Collections featured in this article.

fields.name: location
fields.label: Location
fields.description: Where the collection is located. [location]
fields.text_allowed_html_tags: strong em a ul ol li b i

fields.name: opening_date
fields.label: Opening Date
fields.description: When the collection opened. [opening_date]

fields.name: closing_date
fields.label: Closing Date
fields.description: When the collection closed. [closing_date]

fields.name: website_name
fields.label: Website Name
fields.description: Display name for an external website (uses URL if not given). [website_name]
fields.text_allowed_html_tags: strong em a ul ol li b i

fields.name: website_url
fields.label: Website URL
fields.description: URL for an external website. [website_url]

fields.name: dead_link
fields.label: Dead Link?
fields.description: Tick if the website is no longer available. [dead_link]

fields.name: standfirst
fields.label: Standfirst
fields.description: A summary of the collection displayed below the title. [standfirst]

fields.name: description
fields.label: Description
fields.description: Describe the collection in as much detail as you like. [description]

fields.name: collection_images
fields.label: Images
fields.description: [collection_images]

fields.name: random_image_order
fields.label: Random Image Order
fields.description: Randomise the order of images? [Field name: random_image_order]

fields.name: notes
fields.label: Notes
fields.description: Additional content to display at the end, e.g. credits. [notes]

fields.name: featured_works
fields.label: Featured Works
fields.description: List of works featured in this collection.

fields.name: in_articles
fields.label: Articles
fields.description: List of articles referrng to this collection.

pods.name: galerio_group
pods.label: Groups
pods.description: Groups of which the profile owner is a member.

pods.name: galerio_label
pods.label: Labels
pods.description: Labels to define and categorise works & collections.

fields.name: creator
fields.label: Creator
fields.text_allowed_html_tags: strong em a ul ol li b i

fields.name: copyright
fields.label: Copyright
fields.text_allowed_html_tags: strong em a ul ol li b i

pods.name: galerio_medium
pods.label: Mediums
pods.description: Materials and processes used to create works.

fields.name: show_profile_image
fields.label: Show profile image?
fields.description: Only valid if enabled site-wide.

fields.name: year_of_birth
fields.label: Born/Formed
fields.description: Year of birth of the artist (or year collective was formed).

fields.name: year_of_death
fields.label: Died/Disbanded
fields.description: Year of death of the artist (or year collective was disbanded).

fields.name: show_lifespan
fields.label: Show birth/death years?
fields.description: Whether to display the year of birth/death (if specified).

fields.name: accolades
fields.label: Accolades
fields.description: Awards, prizes etc. Read-only for contributors.

fields.name: definitive_title
fields.label: Definitive Title
fields.description: The definitive name for the work, if one exists, otherwise the post title is used.
fields.text_allowed_html_tags: strong em a ul ol li b i

fields.name: creator
fields.label: Creator
fields.description: Connect the profile of the work's creator. Add a new creator profile if one doesn't exist.

fields.name: year
fields.label: Year
fields.description: The year the work was completed.

fields.name: principal_image
fields.label: Principal Image
fields.description: A primary, reference image of the work.

fields.name: description
fields.label: Description
fields.description: Describe the work in as much detail as needed.

fields.name: website_name
fields.label: Website Name
fields.description: The display name of a website for further reading.
fields.text_allowed_html_tags: strong em a ul ol li b i

fields.name: website_url
fields.label: Website URL
fields.description: Add the link address of an external website with more information.

fields.name: additional_images
fields.label: Additional Images
fields.description: Additional images of the work.

fields.name: work_medium
fields.label: Medium
fields.description: Text description of the work medium(s).
fields.text_allowed_html_tags: strong em a ul ol li b i

fields.name: work_categorisation
fields.label: Categorisation
fields.description: The genre/style/movement/form of the work.
fields.text_allowed_html_tags: strong em a ul ol li b i

fields.name: work_dimensions
fields.label: Dimensions
fields.description: The absolute size of the work, if physical.
fields.text_allowed_html_tags: strong em a ul ol li b i

fields.name: work_duration
fields.label: Duration
fields.description: The duration of the work, if relevant.
fields.text_allowed_html_tags: strong em a ul ol li b i

fields.name: in_collections
fields.label: Collections
fields.description: List the collections in which this work has been featured.

fields.name: related_works
fields.label: Related Works
fields.description: Other works that may be related to this one.

templates.name: Collection Template
templates.code:
{@post_title}

{@description}
[if opening_date]
{@opening_date}[if closing_date] - {@closing_date}[/if]
[/if] [if location]
{@location}
[/if] [if website_url]
Website: [if website_name]{@website_name}[else]{@website_url}[/if]
[/if]

templates.name: Linear Gallery
templates.code: [each collection_images] [/each]

templates.name: Profile Box
templates.code:
[if show_profile_image] {@profile_image._img.thumbnail} [else] [if post_thumbnail] {@post_thumbnail} [else] [/if] [/if]

{@post_title}

View

templates.name: Profile Template
templates.code:
[if post_thumbnail] [/if]

{@post_title}

[if show_lifespan]
[if year_of_birth] b. {@year_of_birth} [/if] [if year_of_death] - d. {@year_of_death} [/if]
[/if]
[each group] {@group.name} [/each]
[if show_profile_image]
{@profile_image._img.thumbnail}
[/if]
[if profile_bio] {@profile_bio} [else]

No information provided. How very mysterious!

Some options are: go back a page, view all profiles, or go to the home page.

[/if]
[if is_collective]

Members:

    [each collective_members]
  • {@collective_members.post_title}
    • [/each]
[/if]
[if in_collections]

Featured in:

    [each in_collections] [if field="in_collections.post_status" value="Published" compare="LIKE"]
  • {@in_collections.post_status}
    • [/if]
  • {@in_collections.post_title}
    • [/each]
[/if] [if featured_works]

Featured works:

    [each featured_works]
  • {@featured_works.post_title}
    • [/each]
[/if] [if accolades]

Accolades:

    [each accolades]
  • {@_value}
    • [/each]
[/if] [if show_external_links]

More links:

    [if personal_website]
  • Artist's website
    • [/if] [if personal_instagram]
  • Instagram profile
    • [/if] [if personal_youtube]
  • YouTube channel
    • [/if] [if personal_vimeo]
  • Vimeo channel
    • [/if] [if personal_facebook]
  • Facebook profile
    • [/if] [if personal_twitter]
  • Twitter page
    • [/if]
[/if]

templates.name: Work Template
templates.code:
[if definitive_title]{@definitive_title}[else]{@post_title}[/if]

[if creators] [/if] [if year_created] [/if] [if work_medium] [/if] [if work_categorisation] [/if] [if work_dimensions] [/if] [if work_duration] [/if] [if in_collections] [/if] [if website_url] [/if]
Creator(s): [each creators] {@creators.post_title}
[/each]
Year: {@year_created}
Medium: {@work_medium}
Genre/Style: {@work_categorisation}
Dimensions: {@work_dimensions}
Duration: {@work_duration}
Featured in: [each in_collections] {@in_collections.post_title}
[/each]
Further reading: [if website_name]{@website_name}[else]{@website_url}[/if]
[if description] {@description} [else]

No additional information given.

[/if]
[if label] [/if] [if medium] [/if] [if group] [/if]
Labels: [each label] {@label.name} [/each]
Mediums: [each medium] {@medium.name} [/each]
Groups: [each group] {@group.name} [/each]
